page.title: 14LIFE ON BORDER SMALLHOLDING
page.content: Occupies ten acres on the South of Scotland Border.House has sitting room,kitchen,3 bedrooms,scullery, pantry and bathroom.Family of five. Stock:-2 Jersey cows,1 Welsh Cob horse 16 Suffolk ewes and lambs,5 ducks, 1 goat and 2 cats. Two acres produce hay. Father(42)Maintains stock,,clips sheep,maintains fences and buildings. Mother(38)Looks after children.general housework,shopping,visiting elderly relations,mendind and sewing,letter writing. Daughter(13)Attends school in Langholm Travels to and from school by car to meet school bus.Eats meal at school.Visits Grandma.Helps with babies,piano practice,watches television and loves popular music. Son(2) Daughter(9months). Have a wonderful life-constant attention.
